> I created an object Player and set it as player object but it refused to move from first room. I created a new object with a different name. I nominated it as the player. This moved perfectly but left an error message saying unknown object or variable Player on all new move

The built in scripts all use `game.pov`, which means the object you selected as the player on the 'Player' tab of the game object.

If that isn't set, it will use any object named `player` (note that's not the same as `Player`); and if there isn't one it will create it in the first room (at the top of the list in the editor).

So… if your scripts refer to an object called `Player` (or `player`), it's up to you to make sure that there's an object with that name.
